GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.76
GSD.description:
i40e: Fix DMA mappings leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.76 by commit 94a171c982b8a8137a00721c1e62bc2713435bca, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit be1222b585fdc410b8c1dbcc57dd03a00f04eff5. For more details please see the references link.
